short_summary: Potential bidders will need to deliver equipment at CFB Halifax and CFB Esquimalt.
description: NOTICE OF PROPOSED PROCUREMENTThe Department of National Defence has a requirement for the items detailed below. The delivery is requested at CFB Halifax, Nova Scotia and CFB Esquimalt, British Columbia.Item 1, GSIN: N4820, NSN: 99-8371221, PARTS KIT, PRESSURE REGULATING VALVEPart No.: J16EMS4E5E561HS, NCAGE: U3341, THOMPSON VALVES LTD.Quantity: 15, Unit of Issue: KT, to be delivered to CFB Halifax, Nova Scotia.Item 2, GSIN: N4820, NSN: 99-8371221, PARTS KIT, PRESSURE REGULATING VALVEPart No.: J16EMS4E5E561HS, NCAGE: U3341, THOMPSON VALVES LTD.Quantity: 3, Unit of Issue: KT, to be delivered to CFB Esquimalt, British Columbia.Item 3, GSIN: N4820, NSN: 99-9021069, VALVE, REGULATING, FLUID PRESSUREPart No.:  J1LEMS4E5E56100, NCAGE: U3341, THOMPSON VALVES LTD.ORPart No.: J16EMS4E5E56100, NCAGE: U3341, THOMPSON VALVES LTD.Quantity: 9, Unit of Issue: EA, to be delivered to CFB Halifax, Nova Scotia.Item 4, GSIN: N4820, NSN: 99-9021069, VALVE, REGULATING, FLUID PRESSUREPart No.:  J1LEMS4E5E56100, NCAGE: U3341, THOMPSON VALVES LTD.ORPart No.: J16EMS4E5E56100, NCAGE: U3341, THOMPSON VALVES LTD.Quantity: 6, Unit of Issue: EA, to be delivered to CFB Esquimalt, British Columbia.
full_summary:
### Tender Announcement
#### Canada

**Title:** Pressure Valve and Pressure Valve Parts Kit
**Reference Number:** PW-22-01004669

**Request for Proposal (RFP) Details:**

The Department of National Defence (DND) is inviting bids for the supply of Pressure Valve and Pressure Valve Parts Kit to be delivered to Canadian Forces Bases (CFB) Halifax, Nova Scotia and CFB Esquimalt, British Columbia.

**Item 1:**

* GSIN: N4820
* NSN: 99-8371221
* Part: Pressure Regulating Valve Parts Kit
* Quantity: 15 units
* Unit of Issue: Kit (KT)
* Delivery Location: CFB Halifax, Nova Scotia

**Item 2:**

* GSIN: N4820
* NSN: 99-8371221
* Part: Pressure Regulating Valve Parts Kit
* Quantity: 3 units
* Unit of Issue: Kit (KT)
* Delivery Location: CFB Esquimalt, British Columbia

**Item 3:**

* GSIN: N4820
* NSN: 99-9021069
* Part: Regulating Valve, Fluid Pressure
* Quantity: 9 units
* Unit of Issue: Each (EA)
* Delivery Location: CFB Halifax, Nova Scotia

**Item 4:**

* GSIN: N4820
* NSN: 99-9021069
* Part: Regulating Valve, Fluid Pressure
* Quantity: 6 units
* Unit of Issue: Each (EA)
* Delivery Location: CFB Esquimalt, British Columbia

**Submission Requirements:**

* Bidders must submit prices in Canadian dollars.
* Equivalent or substitute products must be clearly identified with brand name, model, and/or part number, and NCAGE.
* Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.

**Crown Rights:**

* The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.
* Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.

**Contact Information:**

* Neil Trousdale
* Email: [Neil.Trousdale@forces.gc.ca](mailto:Neil.Trousdale@forces.gc.ca)
* Department of National Defence
* 101 Colonel By Dr, Ottawa, ON K1A 0K2, Canada

**Tender Documents:**

Please refer to the tender documents for further details.

* English RFP Clauses: [
